Article.Title: The AOL Announcement The Video(s) TCTV
Article.Content: Facebook LinkedIn Armstrong Announces AOL’s Acquisition of TechCrunch Facebook LinkedIn Erick Schonfeld and Tim Armstrong on TechCrunch Acquisition As you may have heard, AOL’s CEO Tim Armstrong had some fairly significant news to announce at TechCrunch Disrupt this morning. Yes, AOL is acquiring TechCrunch and all of our properties and yes, we will be joining the AOL Technology Network. If you missed the live feed, we have videos of the on-stage announcement and co-editor Erick Schonfeld’s backstage interview with Armstrong. See videos above.
